page.title: 15Transport _ public
page.content:
{PUBLIC:_ {Northern Railways}operate from Belfast to Larne and from Ballycarry Station there is an adequate service in both directions.The trains connect with the following cross channel ferries:_ Larne _ Stranraer Larne _ Cairnryan Belfast _ Liverpool Belfast _ Isle of Man
{Ulsterbus}services in the area are: Whitehead _ Brown's Bay (Low Road) Whitehead _ Brown's Bay (Middle Rd.) Whitehead _ Ballycarry _ Belfast Ballycarry _ Larne
During term time school buses run:_ Islandmagee _ Carrickfergus Ballycarry _ Carrickfergus
